line[0]="I've told myself so many times before" line[1]="But this time I think I mean it for sure" line[2]="We have reached a full stop" line[3]="Nothing's gonna save us from the big drop" line[4]="Reached our natural conclusion" line[5]="Outlived the illusion" line[6]="I hate being in these situations" line[7]="That call for diplomatic relations" line[8]="If I only knew the answer" line[9]="Or I thought we had a chance" line[10]="Or I could stop this" line[11]="I would stop this thing from spreading like a cancer" line[12]="What can I say? (I don't want to play) anymore" line[13]="What can I say? I'm heading for the door" line[14]="I can't stand this emotional violence" line[15]="Leave in silence" line[16]="Leave in silence" line[17]="We've been running around in circles all year" line[18]="Doing this and that and getting nowhere" line[19]="This'll be the last time" line[20]="(I think I said that last time)" line[21]="If I only had a potion," line[22]="Some magical lotion" line[23]="That could stop this, I would stop this" line[24]="I would set the wheels in motion" line[25]="What can I say? (I don't want to play) anymore" line[26]="What can I say?
